languages.text: "Ваши слова... совсем как говаривал покойный наставник Вайс. Почему-то эта мысль не давала ему покоя". {n}Глубокая морщина прорезает лоб астропата.{/n} "Я тоже думал об этом, и решил, что мучить себя подобными вопросами — только приближать ту самую смерть в варпе".

traits.locale_text: "Ваши слова... совсем как говаривал покойный наставник Вайс. Почему-то эта мысль не давала ему покоя". {n}Глубокая морщина прорезает лоб астропата.{/n} "Я тоже думал об этом, и решил, что мучить себя подобными вопросами — только приближать ту самую смерть в варпе".

languages.text: "Your words... They so remind me of what the late Master Weisz used to say. For reasons I will never know, this thought always troubled him." {n}The Choirmaster's brow furrows.{/n} "After some reflection of my own, I concluded that tormenting myself with such questions would only make said death in the warp arrive that much sooner."

For reasons I will never know, this thought always troubled him." {n}The Choirmaster's brow furrows.{/n} "After some reflection of my own, I concluded that tormenting myself with such questions would only make said death in the warp arrive that much sooner."

languages.text: «Sus palabras... me recuerdan a lo que solía decir el difunto maestro Weisz. Por motivos que nunca entenderé, esta idea siempre le preocupó». {n}El maestro del Coro frunce el ceño.{/n} «Tras meditarlo a fondo, he concluido que atormentarme con esas cuestiones no conseguiría otra cosa que esa misma muerte prematura en la disformidad».
languages.original_text: "Your words... They so remind me of what the late Master Weisz used to say. For reasons I will never know, this thought always troubled him." {n}The Choirmaster's brow furrows.{/n} "After some reflection of my own, I concluded that tormenting myself with such questions would only make said death in the warp arrive that much sooner."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras... me recuerdan a lo que solía decir el difunto maestro Weisz. Por motivos que nunca entenderé, esta idea siempre le preocupó». {n}El maestro del Coro frunce el ceño.{/n} «Tras meditarlo a fondo, he concluido que atormentarme con esas cuestiones no conseguiría otra cosa que esa misma muerte prematura en la disformidad».

languages.text: 「あなたの言葉は…亡きワイズ様の事を思い出させます。私に理由は分かりませんが、彼はいつも悩んでいました」{n}クワイアーマスターは眉をひそめた。{/n}「私なりに考えた結果、そのような疑問で自分を苦しめても、<歪み>での死がより早く訪れるだけだと気が付きました」
languages.original_text: "Your words... They so remind me of what the late Master Weisz used to say. For reasons I will never know, this thought always troubled him." {n}The Choirmaster's brow furrows.{/n} "After some reflection of my own, I concluded that tormenting myself with such questions would only make said death in the warp arrive that much sooner."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言葉は…亡きワイズ様の事を思い出させます。私に理由は分かりませんが、彼はいつも悩んでいました」{n}クワイアーマスターは眉をひそめた。{/n}「私なりに考えた結果、そのような疑問で自分を苦しめても、<歪み>での死がより早く訪れるだけだと気が付きました」

languages.text: “您的话语……不禁让我想起已故的唱诗大师威茨曾说过的话。出于某种我并不清楚的原因，这个问题始终困扰着他。”{n}唱诗大师皱起了眉头。{/n}“根据我自己的思考，我得出了这样的结论——用这样的问题折磨自己，只会让自己在亚空间里死得更快。”
languages.original_text: "Your words... They so remind me of what the late Master Weisz used to say. For reasons I will never know, this thought always troubled him." {n}The Choirmaster's brow furrows.{/n} "After some reflection of my own, I concluded that tormenting myself with such questions would only make said death in the warp arrive that much sooner."

traits.locale_text: “您的话语……不禁让我想起已故的唱诗大师威茨曾说过的话。出于某种我并不清楚的原因，这个问题始终困扰着他。”{n}唱诗大师皱起了眉头。{/n}“根据我自己的思考，我得出了这样的结论——用这样的问题折磨自己，只会让自己在亚空间里死得更快。”

languages.text: "Eure Worte ... Sie erinnern mich daran, was der verstorbene Meister Weisz immer sagte. Dieser Gedanke hat ihn aus unerfindlichen Gründen immer beunruhigt." {n}Der Chormeister runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich habe nachgedacht und bin zu der Erkenntnis gelangt, dass mich besagter Tod im Warp deutlich schneller ereilen wird, wenn ich mich mit derartigen Fragen quäle.
languages.original_text: "Your words... They so remind me of what the late Master Weisz used to say. For reasons I will never know, this thought always troubled him." {n}The Choirmaster's brow furrows.{/n} "After some reflection of my own, I concluded that tormenting myself with such questions would only make said death in the warp arrive that much sooner."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte ... Sie erinnern mich daran, was der verstorbene Meister Weisz immer sagte. Dieser Gedanke hat ihn aus unerfindlichen Gründen immer beunruhigt." {n}Der Chormeister runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich habe nachgedacht und bin zu der Erkenntnis gelangt, dass mich besagter Tod im Warp deutlich schneller ereilen wird, wenn ich mich mit derartigen Fragen quäle.

languages.text: « Vos propos... J'ai l'impression d'entendre le défunt maître Weisz. Pour des raisons que je ne m'explique pas, cette pensée l'a toujours troublé. » {n}Le maître de chœur fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Après mûre réflexion, j'en ai conclu que m'embarrasser avec ce genre de questions ne ferait que précipiter ma mort au sein du Warp. »
languages.original_text: "Your words... They so remind me of what the late Master Weisz used to say. For reasons I will never know, this thought always troubled him." {n}The Choirmaster's brow furrows.{/n} "After some reflection of my own, I concluded that tormenting myself with such questions would only make said death in the warp arrive that much sooner."

traits.locale_text: « Vos propos... J'ai l'impression d'entendre le défunt maître Weisz. Pour des raisons que je ne m'explique pas, cette pensée l'a toujours troublé. » {n}Le maître de chœur fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Après mûre réflexion, j'en ai conclu que m'embarrasser avec ce genre de questions ne ferait que précipiter ma mort au sein du Warp. »

languages.text: "Sözleriniz... Rahmetli Üstat Weisz'ın bir vakitler söylediklerini bir hayli hatırlatıyor. Nedendir asla bilemeyeceğim ama bu düşünce, onu hep rahatsız etmiştir." {n}Koro Şefi kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Kendimle ilgili uzunca bir süre düşündüm. Ardından böyle sorularla kendime eziyet etmemin yalnızca bahsettiğiniz öteboyut ölümünü daha erkene alacağı sonucuna vardım."
languages.original_text: "Your words... They so remind me of what the late Master Weisz used to say. For reasons I will never know, this thought always troubled him." {n}The Choirmaster's brow furrows.{/n} "After some reflection of my own, I concluded that tormenting myself with such questions would only make said death in the warp arrive that much sooner."
